original_text: So Solomon sat on the throne of David his father, and his kingdom was firmly established.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 그의 아버지 다윗의 왕위에 앉으니 그의 나라가 심히 견고하니라

sentences.original_text: So Solomon sat on the throne of David his father
sentences.korean_translation: 이에 솔로몬은 그 아버지 다윗의 왕위에 앉았다

sentences.original_text: and his kingdom was firmly established.
